oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Schools; Educational facilities; Rural schools; Public schools
Education; Education - Tennessee; Education - History - Tennessee; School buildings - Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Front and side views of a brick school building. There is a sign over the front entrance that reads, "Double Springs School 1934."

This school replaced the old Double Springs School. It first opened its doors to students in 1934. A Double Springs School reunion was held on June 19, 1982, with several former teachers and students in attendance.
